content: meet ellie the butterfly she s ready to be made into a new friend **size** this doll is 13cm /5 1 inches from the tip of the antennas to the bottom **materials** 1 worsted weight yarn i used drops ♥you #8 in light lilac and grey and old pink for embroidery one ball of each color should be enough 2 crochet hook i used 2 5mm us b uk 14 3 stuffing 4 black embroidery thread 5 embroidery/tapestry needle 6 stitch markers this pattern is for personal use only if you publish photos of the toys you made using this pattern please credit the author
